ComicInfo.Title: Fox Hunt, Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Turtles return to NYC thinking that the worst is finally behind them. Little do they know that the ultimate danger lurks within their very headquarters!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Dave Wachter | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Michael Walsh | 3 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 4 | RE | Anastasia's Collectibles Exclusive Variant Cover | Alex Kotkin (a) & Ula Mos (c) | 5-6 | RE | Eastman Fun Club Edition Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman | 7 | 2nd | Second Printing Cover | Dave Wachter | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 11:40:52. [CVDB535268]

ComicInfo.Colorist: Ronda Pattison, Tomi Varga, Urszula Mos

ComicInfo.Characters: Alopex, Angel, April O'Neil, Jennika, Kitsune, Leonardo, Master Splinter, Michelangelo, Raphael
